mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (email, password, name, nickname, age, gender, regdate) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{age}, #{gender}, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET password = #{password}, name = #{name}, nickname = #{nickname}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender} WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.select: SELECT name, nickname, email, age, gender, regdate FROM user
SELECT name, nickname, email, age, gender, regdate FROM user WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
